# supET：打造共生型工业互联网平台生态白皮书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/supet-dazao-gongsheng-xing-gongye-hulianwang-pingtai-shengtai-baipishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/supet-dazao-gongsheng-xing-gongye-hulianwang-pingtai-shengtai-baipishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install supet-dazao-gongsheng-xing-gongye-hulianwang-pingtai-shengtai-baipishu
supet-dazao-gongsheng-xing-gongye-hulianwang-pingtai-shengtai-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g supet-dazao-gongsheng-xing-gongye-hulianwang-pingtai-shengtai-baipishu
supet-dazao-gongsheng-xing-gongye-hulianwang-pingtai-shengtai-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
